sensory_systems.name: Volumetric Grain Analysis System (VGAS)
sensory_systems.description: High-resolution 3D scanning of grain volume and texture using multi-angle laser scanning and hyperspectral imaging. Detects particle size distribution, moisture content, and subtle textural variations within the flour.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Root Mean Squared Error (RMSE) for particle size, Relative Standard Deviation (RSD) for moisture.

sensory_systems.name: Olfactory Mapping System (OMS)
sensory_systems.description: Real-time analysis of volatile organic compounds (VOCs) released during dough mixing and fermentation. Employs an array of miniature micro-sensors combined with machine learning for flavor prediction.

technical_specifications.flavor_prediction_accuracy: ± 0.8 points on a 1-5 scale (based on trained models)

sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Bias and Mean Absolute Error (MAE) for flavor compound concentration prediction.

sensory_systems.name: Visual Dough Quality Assessment (VDQA)
sensory_systems.description: Automated image analysis of dough appearance – bubble size, crust development, and crumb structure – using convolutional neural networks (CNNs) trained on a vast dataset of bread images.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Intersection over Union (IoU) for bubble segmentation, Classification accuracy (Precision, Recall, F1-score).

control_systems.name: Adaptive Fermentation Control System (AFCS)
control_systems.description: Closed-loop control system using data from VGAS, OMS, and VDQA to dynamically adjust temperature, humidity, and CO2 levels during fermentation. Utilizes Model Predictive Control (MPC).

control_systems.name: Precision Dough Mixing Controller
control_systems.description: Precise control of mixer speed and duration, based on real-time sensory data, to achieve optimal dough development.
control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Shear Force Variance, Dough Development Time.

mechanical_systems.name: Modular Robotic Dough Handling System
mechanical_systems.description: A network of articulated robotic arms and conveyor belts designed for precise loading, unloading, and transferring of dough during the baking process.

technical_specifications.end_effector_type: Vacuum Gripper, Custom Dough Transfer Tool

mechanical_systems.name: Automated Shaping System
mechanical_systems.description: Robotically controlled shaping molds and pressing mechanisms, utilizing silicone molds and pneumatic actuators for various bread shapes.

software_integration.name: Centralized Bread Recipe Management System (BRMS)
software_integration.description: A cloud-based system for managing bread recipes, controlling the entire automation workflow, and collecting data for continuous improvement.

software_integration.name: Machine Learning Model Training & Optimization Pipeline
software_integration.description: Automated system for training and continuously optimizing the ML models used in all sensory systems and control systems.
software_integration.accuracy_metrics: Model Performance Metrics (as defined in sensory systems).

key_research_areas: Robotics for Dough Handling (Dexterity, Force Control)
